document_data.name: Kerrenderit Arrow
document_data.mainbody: '''Kerrenderit arrows''' were magical [[arrow]]s made by [[arctic dwarves]] from [[kerrenderit]] crystals.
document_data.Description: Kerrenderit arrows were made with arrowheads carved from the namesake crystals, and required the imbuement of ''[[chill metal]]'' to be properly fashioned. The result of all this effort was a superior magical arrow that flew further and left grievous bleeding wounds, although it risked melting into nothing if exposed to temperatures above {{SI|50|F}} for more than an hour.
